problems.title: Find the Difference (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given two strings s and t.
String t is generated by random shuffling string s and then add one more letter at a random position.
Return the letter that was added to t.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abcd abcde

Sample Output
e

Explanation: 'e' is the letter that was added.

Sample Input
 y

Sample Output
y

Explanation: 'y' is the letter that was added to empty string.
problems.constraints:
0 <= s.length <= 1000
t.length == s.length + 1
s and t consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Use XOR operation: XOR all characters in s and t together.
The result will be the character that was added to t.
